trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell 指令程式

trans-unit.source: Set-ScheduledJobOption
trans-unit.target: Set-ScheduledJobOption

trans-unit.source: Set-ScheduledJobOption
trans-unit.target: Set-ScheduledJobOption

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 概要

trans-unit.source: Changes the job options of a scheduled job.
trans-unit.target: 變更排程工作的工作選項。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 語法

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The **Set-ScheduledJobOptions** cmdlet changes the job options of scheduled jobs.
trans-unit.target: **Set-scheduledjoboptions** 指令程式會變更排程工作的工作選項。

trans-unit.source: To change the options of a scheduled job, begin by using the Get-ScheduledJobOption cmdlet to get the job options of a scheduled job.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更排程工作的選項，請先使用 Get-scheduledjoboption cmdlet 來取得排程工作的工作選項。

trans-unit.source: Then, pipe the options to **Set-ScheduledJobOption** or save the options in a variable and use the **InputObject** parameter of **Set-ScheduledJobOption** cmdlet to identify the options.
trans-unit.target: 接著，使用管線傳送選項，以 **Set-scheduledjoboption** 或將選項儲存在變數中並使用 **InputObject** 參數 **Set-scheduledjoboption** 指令程式來識別選項。

trans-unit.source: Use the remaining parameters of **Set-ScheduledJobOption** to change the job options.
trans-unit.target: 使用其餘參數的 **Set-scheduledjoboption** 來變更工作選項。

trans-unit.source: To turn on a job option, use the parameter that sets that option.
trans-unit.target: 若要開啟工作選項，請使用設定該選項的參數。

trans-unit.source: To turn off an option, type the parameter name, a colon (:), and **$false**.
trans-unit.target: 若要關閉選項，輸入 [參數名稱、 冒號 （:） 和 **$false**。

trans-unit.source: For example, to turn off the **RunElevated** option, type `-RunElevated:$false`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要關閉 **RunElevated** 選項，然後輸入 `-RunElevated:$false`。

trans-unit.source: Each job options object includes a **JobDefinition** property that contains the scheduled job, so the association with the scheduled job is retained when the job options are changed.
trans-unit.target: 每個工作選項物件都包含 **JobDefinition** 包含排程的工作，因此變更工作選項時，會保留與排程工作關聯的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The scheduled job options determine how the job runs when it is started by Task Scheduler.
trans-unit.target: 排程工作選項決定工作由 [工作排程器] 啟動時的執行方式。

trans-unit.source: These options to not apply when you use the Start-Job cmdlet to start a scheduled job.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用 Start-job cmdlet 來啟動排程的工作不會套用這些選項。

trans-unit.source: **Set-ScheduledJobOption** is one of a collection of job scheduling cmdlets in the PSScheduledJob module that is included in Windows PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: **Set-scheduledjoboption** 是 Windows PowerShell 所包含 PSScheduledJob 模組中工作排程 cmdlet 集合之一。

trans-unit.source: For more information about Scheduled Jobs, see the About topics in the PSScheduledJob module.
trans-unit.target: 如需排程工作的詳細資訊，請參閱 PSScheduledJob 模組中的「關於」主題。

trans-unit.source: Import the PSScheduledJob module and then type: `Get-Help about_Scheduled*` or see about_Scheduled_Jobs.
trans-unit.target: 匯入 PSScheduledJob 模組，然後輸入︰ `Get-Help about_Scheduled*` 或請參閱 about_Scheduled_Jobs。

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此 Cmdlet 是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 引進。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: Example 1: Change job options
trans-unit.target: 範例 1︰ 變更工作選項

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to change the options of a scheduled job on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 此範例顯示如何變更本機電腦上之排程工作的選項。

trans-unit.source: Example 2: Change an option on all remote scheduled jobs
trans-unit.target: 範例 2︰ 變更所有遠端排程工作選項

trans-unit.source: This command changes the value of the IdleTimeout from one hour (the default value) to two hours on all scheduled jobs on the Server01 computer.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會將 Server01 電腦上所有排程工作之 IdleTimeout 的值從一小時 (預設值) 變更為兩小時。

trans-unit.source: The command uses the Invoke-Command cmdlet to run a command on the Server01 computer.
trans-unit.target: 命令使用 Invoke-command cmdlet 在 Server01 電腦上執行命令。

trans-unit.source: The remote command begins with a Get-ScheduledJob command that gets all scheduled jobs on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 遠端命令取得電腦的所有排程的工作的 Get-scheduledjob 命令的開頭。

trans-unit.source: The scheduled jobs are piped to the Get-ScheduledJobOption cmdlet, which gets the job options of the scheduled jobs.
trans-unit.target: Get-scheduledjoboption 指令程式，它會取得排程工作的工作選項，會使用管線傳送排程的工作。

trans-unit.source: Each job options object contains a **JobDefinition** property that contains the scheduled job, so the options object remains associated with the scheduled job even when it is changed.
trans-unit.target: 每個工作選項物件包含 **JobDefinition** 包含排程的工作，因此選項物件會維持與排程工作相關聯，即使它已被變更的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The job triggers are piped to the **Set-ScheduledJobOption** cmdlet, which changes the value of the IdleTimeout option to two hours (2:00:00).
trans-unit.target: 工作觸發程序便會輸送到 **Set-scheduledjoboption** 指令程式，以將 IdleTimeout 選項的值變更為兩個小時 (2: 00:00)。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 參數

trans-unit.source: -ContinueIfGoingOnBattery
trans-unit.target: -ContinueIfGoingOnBattery

trans-unit.source: Do not stop the scheduled job if the computer switches to battery power (disconnects from AC power) while the job is running.
trans-unit.target: 當電腦切換到電池電源 (中斷 AC 電源)，若工作正在執行，不要停止排程工作。

trans-unit.source: By default, scheduled jobs stop when the computer disconnects from AC power.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設值，當電腦中斷 AC 電源時，排程工作會停止。

trans-unit.source: The **ContinueIfGoingOnBattery** parameter sets the value of the **StopIfGoingOnBatteries** property of scheduled jobs to True.
trans-unit.target: **ContinueIfGoingOnBattery** 參數設定的值 **StopIfGoingOnBatteries** 屬性為 True 的排程工作。

trans-unit.source: -DoNotAllowDemandStart
trans-unit.target: -DoNotAllowDemandStart

trans-unit.source: Start the job only when it is triggered.
trans-unit.target: 只有在工作被觸發時才啟動工作。

trans-unit.source: Users cannot start the job manually, such as by using the Run feature in Task Scheduler.
trans-unit.target: 使用者無法手動啟動工作，例如使用 [工作排程器] 中的 [執行] 功能。

trans-unit.source: This parameter only affects Task Scheduler.
trans-unit.target: 此參數只會影響 [工作排程器]。

trans-unit.source: It does not prevents users from using the Start-Job cmdlet to start the job.
trans-unit.target: 它無法防止使用者使用 Start-job cmdlet 來啟動工作。

trans-unit.source: The **DoNotAllowDemandStart** parameter sets the value of the **DoNotAllowDemandStart** property of scheduled jobs to True.
trans-unit.target: **DoNotAllowDemandStart** 參數設定的值 **DoNotAllowDemandStart** 屬性為 True 的排程工作。

trans-unit.source: -HideInTaskScheduler
trans-unit.target: -HideInTaskScheduler

trans-unit.source: Do not display the job in Task Scheduler.
trans-unit.target: 不要在 [工作排程器] 中顯示工作。

trans-unit.source: This value affects only the computer on which the job runs.
trans-unit.target: 此值只會影響工作執行所在電腦。

trans-unit.source: By default, scheduled tasks appear in Task Scheduler.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設值，排程工作會出現在 [工作排程器] 中。

trans-unit.source: Even if a task is hidden, users can display the task by selecting the "**Show hidden tasks**" view option in Task Scheduler.
trans-unit.target: 即使工作隱藏的使用者可以選取顯示 「 工作 」**顯示隱藏的工作**「 工作排程器中檢視選項。

trans-unit.source: The **HideInTaskScheduler** parameter sets the value of the **ShowInTaskScheduler** property of scheduled jobs to False.
trans-unit.target: **HideInTaskScheduler** 參數設定的值 **ShowInTaskScheduler** 屬性為 False 的排程工作。

trans-unit.source: -IdleDuration
trans-unit.target: -IdleDuration

trans-unit.source: Specifies how long the computer must be idle before the job starts.
trans-unit.target: 指定工作啟動前的電腦閒置時間長度。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 10 minutes.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 10 分鐘。

trans-unit.source: If the computer is not idle for the specified duration before the value of **IdleTimeout** expires, the scheduled job does not run until the next scheduled time, if any.
trans-unit.target: 如果電腦不是閒置之前的值在指定期間內的 **IdleTimeout** 到期，排程的工作不會執行直到下一個排定的時間，如果有的話。

trans-unit.source: Enter a timespan object, such as one generated by the New-TimeSpan cmdlet, or enter a value in \<hours\>:\<minutes\>:\<seconds\> format that is automatically converted to a timespan object
trans-unit.target: 輸入 timespan 物件，例如 New-timespan cmdlet，產生的或輸入值 \<小時\>:\<分鐘\>:\<秒\> 會自動轉換為 timespan 物件的格式

trans-unit.source: To enable this value, use the **StartIfIdle** parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用這個值，請使用 **StartIfIdle** 參數。

trans-unit.source: By default, the **StartIfNotIdle** property of scheduled jobs is set to True and Windows PowerShell ignores the **IdleDuration** and **IdleTimeout** values.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設， **StartIfNotIdle** 的排程工作的屬性設為 True，且 Windows PowerShell 會略過 **IdleDuration** 和 **IdleTimeout** 值。

trans-unit.source: -IdleTimeout
trans-unit.target: -IdleTimeout

trans-unit.source: Specifies how long the computer must be idle before the job starts.
trans-unit.target: 指定工作啟動前的電腦閒置時間長度。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 10 minutes.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 10 分鐘。

trans-unit.source: If the computer is not idle for the specified duration before the value of **IdleTimeout** expires, the scheduled job does not run until the next scheduled time, if any.
trans-unit.target: 如果電腦不是閒置之前的值在指定期間內的 **IdleTimeout** 到期，排程的工作不會執行直到下一個排定的時間，如果有的話。

trans-unit.source: Enter a timespan object, such as one generated by the New-TimeSpan cmdlet, or enter a value in \<hours\>:\<minutes\>:\<seconds\> format that is automatically converted to a timespan object.
trans-unit.target: 輸入 timespan 物件，例如 New-timespan cmdlet，產生的或輸入值 \<小時\>:\<分鐘\>:\<秒\> 會自動轉換為 timespan 物件的格式。

trans-unit.source: To enable this value, use the **StartIfIdle** parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用這個值，請使用 **StartIfIdle** 參數。

trans-unit.source: By default, the **StartIfNotIdle** property of scheduled jobs is set to True and Windows PowerShell ignores the **IdleDuration** and **IdleTimeout** values.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設， **StartIfNotIdle** 的排程工作的屬性設為 True，且 Windows PowerShell 會略過 **IdleDuration** 和 **IdleTimeout** 值。

trans-unit.source: -InputObject
trans-unit.target: -InputObject

trans-unit.source: Specifies the job options.
trans-unit.target: 指定工作選項。

trans-unit.source: Enter a variable that contains **ScheduledJobOptions** objects or type a command or expression that gets **ScheduledJobOptions** objects, such as a Get-ScheduledJobOption command.
trans-unit.target: 輸入變數，其中包含 **ScheduledJobOptions** 物件，或輸入的命令或運算式，取得 **ScheduledJobOptions** 物件，例如 Get-scheduledjoboption 命令。

trans-unit.source: You can also pipe a **ScheduledJobOptions** object to **Set-ScheduledJobOption**.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用管線 **ScheduledJobOptions** 物件傳遞給 **Set-scheduledjoboption**。

trans-unit.source: -MultipleInstancePolicy
trans-unit.target: -MultipleInstancePolicy

trans-unit.source: Determines how the system responds to a request to start an instance of a scheduled job while another instance of the job is running.
trans-unit.target: 決定當排程工作的某個執行個體已在執行時，系統如何回應啟動該排程工作之另一個執行個體的要求。

trans-unit.source: The default value is **IgnoreNew**.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 **IgnoreNew**。

trans-unit.source: Valid values are:
trans-unit.target: 有效值為：

trans-unit.source: **IgnoreNew**: The new job instance is ignored.
trans-unit.target: **IgnoreNew**︰ 已忽略新的工作執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This is the default value.
trans-unit.target: 這是預設值。

trans-unit.source: **Parallel**: The new job instance starts immediately.
trans-unit.target: **平行**︰ 立即啟動新的工作執行個體。

trans-unit.source: **Queue**: The new job instance starts as soon as the current instance completes.
trans-unit.target: **佇列**︰ 在目前的執行個體完成時，啟動新的工作執行個體。

trans-unit.source: **StopExisting**: The current instance of the job stop and the new instance starts.
trans-unit.target: **StopExisting**︰ 工作停止的目前執行個體，而新的執行個體開始。

trans-unit.source: To run the job, all conditions for the job schedule must be met.
trans-unit.target: 必須符合工作排程的所有條件，工作才會執行。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the conditions that are set by the **RequireNetwork**, **IdleDuration** and **IdleTimeout** parameters are not satisfied, the job instance is not started, regardless of the value of this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果條件為設定 **RequireNetwork**, ，**IdleDuration** 和 **IdleTimeout** 不符合參數、 未啟動的工作執行個體，不論此參數的值。

trans-unit.source: -PassThru
trans-unit.target: -PassThru

trans-unit.source: Returns the job options that changed.
trans-unit.target: 傳回已變更的工作選項。

trans-unit.source: By default, this cmdlet does not generate any output.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，此 Cmdlet 不會產生任何輸出。

trans-unit.source: -RequireNetwork
trans-unit.target: -RequireNetwork

trans-unit.source: Runs the scheduled job only when network connections are available.
trans-unit.target: 只有在網路連線可以使用時才執行排程工作。

trans-unit.source: If you specify this parameter and the network is not available at the scheduled start time, the job does not run until the next scheduled start time, if any.
trans-unit.target: 若指定此參數且網路連線在排定的啟動時間無法使用，該工作不會執行 (直到排定的下次啟動時間，如果有的話)。

trans-unit.source: The **RequireNetwork** parameter sets the value of the **RunWithoutNetwork** property of scheduled jobs to False.
trans-unit.target: **RequireNetwork** 參數設定的值 **RunWithoutNetwork** 屬性為 False 的排程工作。

trans-unit.source: -RestartOnIdleResume
trans-unit.target: -RestartOnIdleResume

trans-unit.source: Restarts a scheduled job when the computer becomes idle.
trans-unit.target: 當電腦成為閒置時重新啟動排程工作。

trans-unit.source: This parameter works with the **StopIfGoingOffIdle** parameter, which suspends a running scheduled job if the computer becomes active (leaves the idle state).
trans-unit.target: 此參數搭配 **StopIfGoingOffIdle** 參數，暫停執行的排程的工作，在電腦成為作用中 （離開閒置狀態）。

trans-unit.source: The **RestartOnIdleResume** parameter sets the value of the **RestartOnIdleResume** property of scheduled jobs to True.
trans-unit.target: **RestartOnIdleResume** 參數設定的值 **RestartOnIdleResume** 屬性為 True 的排程工作。

trans-unit.source: -RunElevated
trans-unit.target: -RunElevated

trans-unit.source: Runs the scheduled job with the permissions of a member of the Administrators group on the computer on which the job runs.
trans-unit.target: 使用工作執行所在電腦上 Administrators 群組成員的權限執行排程工作。

trans-unit.source: To enable a scheduled job to run with Administrator permissions, use the **Credential** parameter of Register-ScheduledJob to provide explicit credential for the job.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用以系統管理員權限執行排程的工作，請使用 **認證** Register-scheduledjob 作業提供明確的認證參數。

trans-unit.source: The **RunElevated** parameter sets the value of the **RunElevated** property of scheduled jobs to True.
trans-unit.target: **RunElevated** 參數設定的值 **RunElevated** 屬性為 True 的排程工作。

trans-unit.source: -StartIfIdle
trans-unit.target: -StartIfIdle

trans-unit.source: Starts the scheduled job if the computer has been idle for the time specified by the **IdleDuration** parameter before the time specified by the **IdleTimeout** parameter expires.
trans-unit.target: 如果電腦已閒置所指定的時間啟動排程的工作 **IdleDuration** 參數所指定的時間之前 **IdleTimeout** 參數到期。

trans-unit.source: By default, the **IdleDuration** and **IdleTimeout** parameters are ignored and the job starts at the scheduled start time even if the computer is busy.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設， **IdleDuration** 和 **IdleTimeout** 參數都會被忽略，並在排定的開始時間會啟動工作，即使電腦忙碌中。

trans-unit.source: If you specify this parameter and the computer is busy (not idle) at the scheduled start time, the job does not run until the next scheduled start time, if any.
trans-unit.target: 若指定此參數且電腦在排定的開始時間為忙碌中 (非閒置)，則工作不會執行 (直到排定的下次開始時間，如果有的話)。

trans-unit.source: The **StartIfIdle** parameter sets the value of the **StartIfNotIdle** property of scheduled jobs to False.
trans-unit.target: **StartIfIdle** 參數設定的值 **StartIfNotIdle** 屬性為 False 的排程工作。

trans-unit.source: -StartIfOnBattery
trans-unit.target: -StartIfOnBattery

trans-unit.source: Starts the scheduled job even if the computer is running on batteries at the scheduled start time.
trans-unit.target: 即使電腦在排定的開始時間是使用電池電力執行，也啟動排程工作。

trans-unit.source: The default value is False.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 False。

trans-unit.source: The **StartIfOnBattery** parameter sets the value of the **StartIfOnBatteries** property of scheduled jobs to True.
trans-unit.target: **StartIfOnBattery** 參數設定的值 **StartIfOnBatteries** 屬性為 True 的排程工作。

trans-unit.source: -StopIfGoingOffIdle
trans-unit.target: -StopIfGoingOffIdle

trans-unit.source: Suspends a running scheduled job if the computer becomes active (not idle) while the job is running.
trans-unit.target: 若電腦在工作正在執行時成為作用中 (非閒置)，則暫停執行中的排程工作。

trans-unit.source: By default, a scheduled job that is suspended when the computer becomes active resumes when the computer becomes idle again.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設值，當電腦再度進入閒置狀態時，當初在電腦成為作用中時暫停的排程工作會繼續執行。

trans-unit.source: To change this default behavior, use the **RestartOnIdleResume** parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更此預設行為，請使用 **RestartOnIdleResume** 參數。

trans-unit.source: The **StopIfGoingOffIdle** parameter sets the value of the **StopIfGoingOffIdle** property of scheduled jobs to True.
trans-unit.target: **StopIfGoingOffIdle** 參數設定的值 **StopIfGoingOffIdle** 屬性為 True 的排程工作。

trans-unit.source: -WakeToRun
trans-unit.target: -WakeToRun

trans-unit.source: Wakes the computer from a Hibernate or Sleep state at the scheduled start time so it can run the job.
trans-unit.target: 在到了排定的開始時間時將電腦從休眠或睡眠狀態喚醒以執行工作。

trans-unit.source: By default, if the computer is in a Hibernate or Sleep state at the scheduled start time, the job does not run.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設值，在到了排定的開始時間時，若電腦處於休眠或睡眠狀態，則工作不會執行。

trans-unit.source: The **WakeToRun** parameter sets the value of the **WakeToRun** property of scheduled jobs to True.
trans-unit.target: **WakeToRun** 參數設定的值 **WakeToRun** 屬性為 True 的排程工作。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 這個 cmdlet 支援一般參數:-偵錯、-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 以及-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸入

trans-unit.source: Microsoft.PowerShell.ScheduledJob.ScheduledJobOptions
trans-unit.target: Microsoft.PowerShell.ScheduledJob.ScheduledJobOptions

trans-unit.source: You can pipe a scheduled job options object to **Set-ScheduledJobOption**.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用管線傳送排程的工作選項物件至 **Set-scheduledjoboption**。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸出

trans-unit.source: None or Microsoft.PowerShell.ScheduledJob.ScheduledJobOptions
trans-unit.target: 無或 Microsoft.PowerShell.ScheduledJob.ScheduledJobOptions

trans-unit.source: When you use the **Passthru** parameter, **Set-ScheduledJobOption** returns the job options that were changed.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用 **Passthru** 參數， **Set-scheduledjoboption** 傳回已變更的工作選項。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this cmdlet does not generate any output.
trans-unit.target: 否則，此 Cmdlet 不會產生任何輸出。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 附註

trans-unit.source: RELATED LINKS
trans-unit.target: 相關的連結

trans-unit.target: about_Scheduled_Jobs

trans-unit.target: Add-JobTrigger

trans-unit.source: Disable-JobTrigger
trans-unit.target: Disable-JobTrigger

trans-unit.source: Disable-ScheduledJob
